Tyger Drew-Honey has shared footage of the moment he confronted a man he claims flashed him on a Spanish beach.

The Outnumbered actor said he was enjoying a walk in Denia on Saturday afternoon when he spotted the man exposing himself in nearby bushes.

23-year-old Drew then approached the man, who appeared to still have his flies open.

In footage shared with the Olive Press , Tyger walks up to the man who attempts to cover his face.

(Image: Dominic Lipinski/PA Wire)

(Image: YouTube)

"I've just been flashed on the beach by this guy," Tyger tells the camera.

"Yeah mate you need to stop walking round on the beach flashing young men.

"This man just flashed me. I have officially been flashed," he adds.

(Image: YouTube)

Tyger revealed on Instagram that he'd been spending some time in Spain with his dad Lindsay Honey, when the alleged incident happened.

He told the Olive Press: "I walked down to get some hats and sunglasses, and then sat on the beach. I considered going for a dip when this man started circling me.

"I thought 'that seems like the behaviour of a flasher', so I turned round and caught him licking his lips at me.

"I hurled abuse at him and he whipped his private parts away, and then just sat there."

(Image: Phil Lewis/WENN.com)

Tyger said as he was walking away he felt the need to 'shame' the man and went back to film him.

He told the Olive press he didn't feel 'spooked' by the alleged incident and had not yet spoken to Denia police.
description: The Outnumbered actor said he was relaxing on a beach when he saw a man exposing himself
